title: Married At First Sight's Susie Bradley flaunts her busty assets after split with Todd Carney
text:
She split with NRL bad boy Todd Carney after just eight months of dating.

But on Monday, Married At First Sight's Susie Bradley showed her ex exactly what he is missing as she flaunted her busty assets in a red crop top.

Taking to Instagram, the 27-year-old cosmetic nurse shared a snap of herself shortly after a workout session and wrote: 'Life is about as blurry as this photo.'

Todd who? Married At First Sight's Susie Bradley (pictured) showed her ex Carney exactly what he is missing as she flaunted her busty assets in a red crop top

'Side note, haven’t worked out that hard in about a year so go me,' she added.

Susie pouted and posed for the camera while seated in a vehicle wearing her sports crop top.

Her post comes after she confirmed her relationship with Todd was over and she had been 'a bit s**t' but she was trying to stay positive.

It's over! On Monday, Susie (left) confirmed that her relationship with Todd (right) was over and she had been 'a bit s**t' but she was trying to stay positive

While taking a stroll near her home in Queensland, Susie addressed her recent split via Instagram.

'Just a little bit of an update on me. So it's been a bit s**t but all is okay... I'm throwing myself into work and, to be honest, I get a lot of pleasure from my work,' she said.

'I really, really, really love meeting people, talking about their lives, talking about my life and making friends. Making friends is like my favourite thing to do.

Susie (pictured with Todd) said: 'I'm throwing myself into work and, to be honest, I get a lot of pleasure from my work'

'So basically I just want to say all my energies and efforts will now be focused on my daughter and my business.'

She concluded: 'If you have been thinking about making an appointment or coming to see me, now is definitely the time.'

Susie and Todd first sparked rumours of a split on Saturday when fans noticed they'd deleted all photos and unfollowed each other on social media.
description: She split with NRL bad boy Todd Carney after just eight months of dating.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
